about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK
From the Celtic-inspired “The Trader's Route” to the wildly enigmatic “Dance of the Forest”, let us take you on a musical adventure across the sprawling Legrand universe and right into the heart of one of our favorite characters, Eris. This album includes crowd favorite “Suteki na Mono” sang by Emi Evans (of Nier: Automata fame).

FEATURES
Includes 12 audio tracks in 320kbps MP3 and high quality lossless (FLAC) format.

TRACK LIST
  • Destiny Begins (feat. Puspallia)
  • Amidst the Breeze (feat. Puspallia)
  • Suteki Na Mono (feat. Emi Evans)
  • Her Father's Pendant (feat. Puspallia)
  • The Trader's Route (feat. Ammy Kurniawan)
  • The Thing about Fate
  • Baptism in Water (feat. Puspallia)
  • Dance of the Forest (feat. Puspallia)
  • Victory's Parade (feat. Ammy Kurniawan)
  • A Quiet Journey
  • Against a God
  • Suteki Na Mono (Reprise)
